mapper.insert: /* carMapper.addCar */ INSERT INTO car(car_no, car_type, tire_change_distance, wiper_change_distance, engine_oil_viscosity, distance, car_id, car_color, cooler_left, member_no) VALUES(#{car_no}, #{car_type}, #{tire_change_distance}, #{wiper_change_distance}, #{engine_oil_viscosity}, #{distance}, #{car_id}, #{car_color}, #{cooler_left}, #{member_no})
mapper.select: /* carMapper.getPersonalCar */ SELECT * FROM CAR JOIN MEMBER ON CAR.member_no = MEMBER.member_no WHERE MEMBER.member_no = (select member_no from member where member_id= #{member_id})
mapper.delete: /* carMapper.removeCar */ DELETE FROM car WHERE car_no = #{car_no}
mapper.select: /* carMapper.getCarNo */ SELECT car_no FROM car WHERE car_id = #{car_id}
